From: 
Sent: Monday, March 15, 2021 5:10 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: FOIA, Jeffrey Epstein 
Hi 
(USANYS) 
In connection with a criminal discovery matter, my colleagues and I were hoping to track down a list of all Jeffrey Epstein-
related FOIA requests, which we understand are tracked through EOUSAIrecommended that we reach out 
to you, in the hopes that you might be able to help us pull together a list (or help us connect with someone who can 
gather that information). We'd very much appreciate any information or guidance you might have. 
Thanks so much, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00018990
